name: My Boring Game
description:
Controls:

WASD - Movement

Mouse - Mouse Movement

Q - Quit

G - Capture Mouse

Shift - Sprint

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Ladies and Gentleman! Coming to you this March is The Most Boring Game Ever!

Starring Rice as The Game Dev who added voice lines

Godot as the engine powering this game. Although, he still hasn't showed up.

Plugins from the Godot asset Library.

Made With Godot Engine 2.1.2

This game is just a short narrative about a game developer who doesn't know what he is doing. Takes less than 10 minutes to play. 2 minutes if you speed run it.

Game was made with the custom FPS Script Templete I'm working on.
